Here is my regression model:

```{r model, collapse=TRUE}
options(digits = 4)
fit <- lm(reg_formula(), data = mtcars)
b   <- coef(fit)
summary(fit)
```

The fitting result is $mpg = `r b[1]` + `r b[2]``r input$x`$.
Below is a scatter plot with the regression line.

```{r plot, fig.height=5}
par(mar = c(4, 4, 1, 1))
plot(reg_formula(), data = mtcars, pch = 19, col = "gray")
abline(fit, col = "red", lwd = 2)
```
